name: grasp
prompt: (Can a typical {} be grasped with one hand?)
description: The object can be grasped in any way

name: cut
prompt: (Can a typical {} be used to cut through objects?)&(Does a typical {} have a blade?)
description: The object can be used to cut other objects

name: scoop
prompt: (Can a typical {} be used to scoop material? The context is culinary.)|(Can a typical {} be used to scoop material? The context is digging.)
description: The object can be used to scoop or shove material like powder or objects

name: contain
prompt: (Is a typical {} designed to put objects or liquids inside of it?)
description: The object is designed to put either objects or liquids inside of it

name: pound
prompt: (Is a {} useful to pound some objects with?)&!(Can objects be pound on top of a {})
description: The object can be swung to pound other objects

name: support
prompt: (Does a typical {} provide good support for objects standing on it?)
description: The object provides good support for other objects standing on it

name: wrap-grasp
prompt: (Can a typical {} be grasped with one hand?)&(Is it possible to wrap ones hand around a typical {})|(Is it possible to wrap ones hand around a part of a typical {})
description: Its possible to wrap ones fingers around the object or parts of it
